mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Pickering, John, 1777-1846
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Knowing Jefferson's interests, presents him with copy of new edition of Dr. Edward's "Observations on the Mohegan language," just published by Pickering's historical society as part of a volume of "Collections"; has added a few notes and a comparative vocabulary of various districts.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1823 February 4, Salem, Massachusetts, to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
